content: a beautiful classical attitude shawl 1 with a great tutorial the simple and elegant shawl is made using color kings cotton bomb 2 which is a luscious and soft cake-yarn available in fabulous colour combinations the crochet pattern for the shawl is simple and makes a beautiful and elegant shawl the poncho can also be crocheted using hobbii twister also available in sultan deluxe https //hobbii com/classical-attitude-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=classical-attitude-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=swr enjoy **materials ** - cotton kings color bomb - 1 skein - crochet hook g 4 0 mm **finished measurements ** approx 73 1⁄4 x 30 3⁄4 gauge 4 x 4 = 21 sts x 10 row **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **half_double_crochet** hald double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet 1 https //hobbii com/classical-attitude-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=classical-attitude-shawl&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/cotton-kings-color-bomb utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ck-color-bomb&utm_term=swr
